description: Erection of hip to gable and L shaped rear dormer roof extensions with chimney stack removal to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and L shaped rear dormer roof extensions with chimney stack removal to facilitate a loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.
